reviews.customers_say: Customers find this cardigan classy and well-made, with beautiful gold buttons that make it look expensive.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice, chic cardigan sweater for the price.
items.body: Lov.e this sweater. I wanted a grey cardigan to wear loose or tucked in with jeans or trousers or skirt. I am very happy with this purchase. Quality seems very good. Nice and soft. Gold buttons add a little chicness to the look. It is fitted but not too snug for me. If you want a looser, boxier fit, size up. Haven't washed yet but am sure it will do well in cold water and air dry. I have several other Pretty Garden items and have been pleased with them---so, I trust the brand. I like this sweather enough that I may order the navy blue. Read more
items.author: Victoria T. Whipple

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater for the price!
items.body: Such a nice sweater for the price! The material is great quality, nice mid-weight sweater. The buttons are also super nice not cheesy gold but a classy gold. This will be a super versatile piece that I can dress up or dress down, looks great with just about anything. Lastly, I have long arms, and the medium fit great! Read more
items.author: Bryn

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable sweater. Great quality.
items.body: Great quality and so cute. Color was exactly as pictured. I'm considering buying it in another color because I love it so much. Fit is true to size. Read more
items.author: Dog Lover

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and weight
items.body: "Exactly what I wanted! I was looking for a long-sleeve sweater that was truly a medium-weight option, and this is it. It's made from a great quality fabric blend that feels soft and looks more expensive than it is. I wear it in my air-conditioned office and it's perfect for keeping cozy without feeling bulky. It's also great for layering making it very versatile. The sleeves are a great length, and the overall construction is excellent. Highly recommend!" This is the 2nd one that I have ordered. Read more
items.author: KatC

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Quality.!!
items.body: Warm. Pretty. Elegant .It fits well.!! Read more
items.author: Elvia Rodriguez

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks super elegant
items.body: This was a great buy!!! Love the fit and it’s super soft and stretchy. Love the color but could have gone smaller. I wear a M but on this sweater I think I could have done with a small. Read more
items.author: Ralph Goff

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy, stylish, stretchy, great.
items.body: In love with this. The buttons are great. It’s thick but not too thick; still hugs my figure nicely. Very stretchy and comfortable. Looks awesome! Read more
items.author: Dana

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great sweater
items.body: Love this sweater. Looks great on me, flattering fit. The gold buttons give it a nice and professional look (bought it to wear to work). The weight is just was I was looking for - a medium-weight layer that doesn’t look bulky. Read more
items.author: ceapena

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Brown, Burgundy, Army Green, Light Green, Black, Dusty Blue, Navy Blue, Oatmeal, Dark Green, Light Blue, Taupe, Pink, White, Beige. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
